name: Secret Santa GameJam 2022
description:
The prompt that I received from my Secret Santa was Racing and Fighting Games. I decided to do a small city racer where you have 3 minutes to race through the city to get to the Exit Gate. While driving through town you will Rocket power-ups that you can shoot at the turrets that are trying to keep you in the city.  

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D - Acceleration/Steering/Reverse
  • Left Shift - Fire Rockets if you have them
  • Space - Drift
  • Tab - Open the Pause Menu.
